info.official_title: MoTriColor: Phase I/II Study With LY3200882 Combined With Capecitabine in Patients With Advanced Chemotherapy Resistant Colorectal Cancer and an Activated TGF-beta Signature

inclusion_lines.line: 1. Histological or cytological proof of CRC;

criterions.exact_snippets: Histological or cytological proof of CRC

inclusion_lines.line: 2. Disease progression or relapse upon at least one line of treatment for advanced CRC with fluoropyrimidine containing chemotherapy as single agent or in combination (combinations with oxaliplatin, irinotecan, bevacizumab and cetuximab/panitumumab are allowed);

criterions.exact_snippets: Disease progression or relapse
at least one line of treatment
advanced CRC
fluoropyrimidine containing chemotherapy as single agent or in combination
combinations with oxaliplatin, irinotecan, bevacizumab and cetuximab/panitumumab are allowed

inclusion_lines.line: 3. Written documentation of activated TGF-β signature-like gene signature, as determined by the validated assay of Agendia;

criterions.exact_snippets: activated TGF-β signature-like gene signature
as determined by the validated assay of Agendia

inclusion_lines.line: 4. Age ≥ 18 years;

criterions.exact_snippets: Age ≥ 18 years

inclusion_lines.line: 5. Able and willing to give written informed consent;

criterions.exact_snippets: Able and willing to give written informed consent

inclusion_lines.line: 6. WHO performance status of ≤ 1;

criterions.exact_snippets: WHO performance status of ≤ 1
LVEF ≥ 55%

inclusion_lines.line: 8. Able and willing to undergo blood sampling for PK and PD analysis;

criterions.exact_snippets: Able and willing to undergo blood sampling for PK and PD analysis
criterions.criterion: blood sampling for PK and PD analysis

inclusion_lines.line: 9. Able and willing to undergo tumor biopsies before start, during treatment and at the end of treatment

criterions.exact_snippets: Able and willing to undergo tumor biopsies before start, during treatment and at the end of treatment

inclusion_lines.line: 10. Life expectancy ≥ 3 months allowing adequate follow up of toxicity evaluation and anti-tumor activity;

criterions.exact_snippets: Life expectancy ≥ 3 months

inclusion_lines.line: 11. Evaluable disease according to RECIST 1.1 criteria (measurable disease for the phase II part; evaluable disease is sufficient for the phase I part);

criterions.exact_snippets: Evaluable disease according to RECIST 1.1 criteria
measurable disease for the phase II part
evaluable disease is sufficient for the phase I part

inclusion_lines.line: 12. Minimal acceptable safety laboratory values

criterions.exact_snippets: Minimal acceptable safety laboratory values

inclusion_lines.line: 1. ANC of ≥ 1.5 x 109 /L

criterions.exact_snippets: ANC of ≥ 1.5 x 109 /L

inclusion_lines.line: 2. Platelet count of ≥ 100 x 109 /L

criterions.exact_snippets: Platelet count of ≥ 100 x 109 /L

inclusion_lines.line: 3. Hepatic function as defined by serum bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x ULN, ALAT and ASAT ≤ 3.0 x ULN, or ALAT and ASAT ≤ 5 x ULN in patients with liver metastases

criterions.exact_snippets: Hepatic function as defined by serum bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x ULN
Hepatic function as defined by ... ALAT and ASAT ≤ 3.0 x ULN
Hepatic function as defined by ... ALAT and ASAT ≤ 5 x ULN in patients with liver metastases
criterions.criterion: ALAT and ASAT in patients with liver metastases

inclusion_lines.line: 4. Renal function as defined by serum creatinine ≤1.5 x ULN

criterions.exact_snippets: Renal function as defined by serum creatinine ≤1.5 x ULN

inclusion_lines.line: 5. Creatinine clearance ≥ 50 ml/min (by Cockcroft-Gault formula or MDRD);

criterions.exact_snippets: Creatinine clearance ≥ 50 ml/min

inclusion_lines.line: 13. Negative pregnancy test (urine or serum) for female patients with childbearing potential.

criterions.exact_snippets: Negative pregnancy test (urine or serum)
female patients with childbearing potential

inclusion_lines.line: Healthy volunteers allowed

criterions.exact_snippets: Healthy volunteers allowed

inclusion_lines.line: Must have minimum age of 18 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: minimum age of 18 Years

exclusion_lines.line: 1. Any treatment with investigational drugs within 30 days prior to receiving the first dose of investigational treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: treatment with investigational drugs within 30 days prior to receiving the first dose of investigational treatment

exclusion_lines.line: 2. Known or suspected dihydropirimidine dehydrogenase deficit (Mutant for DPD*2A genotype, 1236 GA genotype, 1679TG genotype and 2846A>T genotype);

criterions.exact_snippets: Known or suspected dihydropirimidine dehydrogenase deficit
Mutant for DPD*2A genotype
1236 GA genotype
1679TG genotype
2846A>T genotype
Symptomatic or untreated leptomeningeal disease

exclusion_lines.line: 4. Symptomatic brain metastasis. Patients previously treated or untreated for these conditions that are asymptomatic in the absence of corticosteroid therapy are allowed to enrol. Brain metastasis must be stable with verification by imaging (e.g. brain MRI or CT (<21 days before start of treatment) completed at screening demonstrating no current evidence of progressive brain metastases). Patients are not permitted to receive enzyme inducing anti-epileptic drugs or corticosteroids;

criterions.exact_snippets: Symptomatic brain metastasis
Patients previously treated or untreated for these conditions that are asymptomatic in the absence of corticosteroid therapy are allowed to enrol
Brain metastasis must be stable with verification by imaging
brain MRI or CT (<21 days before start of treatment) completed at screening
demonstrating no current evidence of progressive brain metastases
Patients are not permitted to receive enzyme inducing anti-epileptic drugs
Patients are not permitted to receive ... corticosteroids

exclusion_lines.line: 5. History of cardiac disease, including myocardial infarction within 6 months before study entry, unstable angina pectoris, New York Heart Association Class III/IV congestive heart failure, or uncontrolled hypertension, major cardiac abnormalities, a predisposition for developing aneurysms including family history of aneurysms, Marfan syndrome, bicuspid aortic valve, or evidence of damage to the large vessels of the heart.

criterions.exact_snippets: History of cardiac disease, including myocardial infarction within 6 months before study entry
History of cardiac disease, including ... unstable angina pectoris
History of cardiac disease, including ... New York Heart Association Class III/IV congestive heart failure
criterions.criterion: New York Heart Association Class III/IV congestive heart failure

criterions.exact_snippets: History of cardiac disease, including ... uncontrolled hypertension
History of cardiac disease, including ... major cardiac abnormalities
a predisposition for developing aneurysms including family history of aneurysms
a predisposition for developing aneurysms including ... Marfan syndrome
a predisposition for developing aneurysms including ... bicuspid aortic valve
evidence of damage to the large vessels of the heart
criterions.criterion: damage to the large vessels of the heart

exclusion_lines.line: 6. Impairment of gastrointestinal (GI) function or GI disease that may significantly alter the absorption of oral LY3200882 (e.g., ulcerative diseases, uncontrolled nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, malabsorption syndrome, small bowel resection);

criterions.exact_snippets: Impairment of gastrointestinal (GI) function or GI disease
ulcerative diseases
uncontrolled nausea
vomiting
diarrhea
malabsorption syndrome
small bowel resection

exclusion_lines.line: 7. Woman who are pregnant or breast feeding;

criterions.exact_snippets: Woman who are pregnant
breast feeding

exclusion_lines.line: 8. Radio- or chemotherapy within the last 2 weeks prior to receiving the first dose of investigational treatment. Palliative radiation (1x 8Gy) is allowed;

criterions.exact_snippets: Radio- or chemotherapy within the last 2 weeks prior to receiving the first dose of investigational treatment.
Palliative radiation (1x 8Gy) is allowed

exclusion_lines.line: 9. Patients who have undergone any major surgery within the last 2 weeks prior to starting study drug or who would not have fully recovered from previous surgery;

criterions.exact_snippets: undergone any major surgery within the last 2 weeks prior to starting study drug
would not have fully recovered from previous surgery

exclusion_lines.line: 10. Active infection requiring systemic antibiotics or uncontrolled infectious disease;

criterions.exact_snippets: Active infection requiring systemic antibiotics
uncontrolled infectious disease

exclusion_lines.line: 11. Patients with a known history of hepatitis B or C or known Human Immunodeficiency Virus HIV-1 or HIV-2 type patients;

criterions.exact_snippets: known history of hepatitis B
known history of hepatitis ... C
known Human Immunodeficiency Virus HIV-1
known Human Immunodeficiency Virus ... HIV-2

exclusion_lines.line: 12. Other severe, acute, or chronic medical or psychiatric condition or laboratory abnormality that may increase the risk associated with study participation or study drug administration or that may interfere with the interpretation of study results and, in the judgment of the investigator, would make the patient inappropriate for the study;

criterions.exact_snippets: Other severe, acute, or chronic medical or psychiatric condition
laboratory abnormality

exclusion_lines.line: 13. Known hypersensitivity to one of the study drugs or excipients.

criterions.exact_snippets: Known hypersensitivity to one of the study drugs
Known hypersensitivity to ... excipients

exclusion_lines.line: 14. For women of childbearing potential: agreement to remain abstinent (refrain from heterosexual intercourse) or use contraceptive methods with a failure rate of <1% per year (when used consistently and correctly) during the treatment period and for at least 90 days after the last dose of LY3200882 and/or capecitabine. More information is available in section 5.2.4.

criterions.exact_snippets: women of childbearing potential
agreement to remain abstinent (refrain from heterosexual intercourse)
use contraceptive methods with a failure rate of <1% per year
during the treatment period and for at least 90 days after the last dose of LY3200882 and/or capecitabine

requirements.expected_value: during the treatment period and for at least 90 days after the last dose of LY3200882 and/or capecitabine

exclusion_lines.line: 15. For men: agreement to remain abstinent (refrain from heterosexual intercourse) or use contraceptive measures, and agreement to refrain from donating sperm, as defined in section 5.2.4.

criterions.exact_snippets: For men: agreement to remain abstinent (refrain from heterosexual intercourse) or use contraceptive measures
agreement to refrain from donating sperm
